ygData.subject: RE: Twisting bug?
ygData.msgSnippet: Lol. Where have I been? I ve never been hit with this until recently. I did make some changes to my video mode (from 640x480 to the next higher scale) but I
ygData.messageBody:
Lol. Where have I been?

I've never been hit with this until recently. I did make some changes to my
video mode (from 640x480 to the next higher scale) but I really doubt that
would affect it. I've always had a high speed connection (either DSL or T1)
and only noticed this recently.

I'd like to think I haven't been oblivious all this time as I've been
twisting 3 (sometimes 4) songs at a time for a while, but I do vaguely
remember someone posting something about a twisting bug a while back.

Ah well, thanks!

Windleaf

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Dave Gaines [mailto:dave@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, January 05, 2000 1:24 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Twisting bug?
>
>
> This bug has been here forever.
>
> > I've noticed the following recently while twisting songs.
> I'm soloing and
> > singing Chant/Chains/Hymn and found that sometimes, just as
> the Chant or
> > Hymn is about to expire I get the following:
> >
> > You whistle an ancient warsong.
> > You stop whistling.
> >
> > In other words, my song kicks in just before it the buff
> expires, but still
> > expires shortly afterwards.
> >
> > Anyone else know about this as a bug?
> >
> > Windleaf Mistsong
> > 26th level Balladeer
> > Bertox
> >
